title: Financing Agricultural Value Chains (Monograph)
description: Monograph from a national seminar outlining principles and challenges of financing agricultural value chains in India.

title: Value Chain Financing in Agriculture: Case Studies from India
description: Case studies illustrating agricultural value chain finance mechanisms in India and other Asian countries.

title: Agricultural Value Chain Finance (FAO Guide)
description: Comprehensive FAO guide explaining value chain finance concepts, instruments, and business models globally.

title: Agricultural Value Chain Finance – A Guide for Bankers
description: Practical guide for bankers, detailing entry points, financing instruments, and operational models for value chain financing.

title: Indian Experience in Application of Agricultural Value Chain Finance
description: Analysis of India's institutional framework, policies, and case studies related to value chain finance development.

title: Sustainable Finance Flows to India's Agriculture Sector (2020–22)
description: Data-driven analysis of financial flows—public, private, domestic, and international—towards sustainable agriculture in India.

title: Detection and Management of Plant Disease Using Artificial Intelligence… A Review
source_organization: Journal of Scientific Research andReports (Review article)
description: Recent 2025 review on the use of AI and machine learning technologies in plant disease detection and management.

title: Plant Disease Detection Using Deep Learning
source_organization: International Journal of Intelligent Systems and Applications (IJISA) / MECS Press
description: Open-access paper on early detection and precise diagnosis of plant diseases using deep learning (EfficientNetV2S, transfer learning) across multiple crop species

title: Development of a Recommendation System for Plant Disease Recognition
description: Research proposing an AI-based recommender system that uses machine learning to detect plant diseases from images.

headers.User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/139.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

title: Disease Prediction Models in Plant Pathology: Leveraging AI and ML
description: 2024 paper on image-based diagnostics and early warning systems empowering farmers with real-time disease protection tools.

title: AI-Based Vegetable Disease Classification (Frontiers Journal)
description: 2024 article reviewing AI-based classification of vegetable leaf diseases, frameworks, challenges, and unresolved issues.

title: Agricultural Credit Utilization and Repayment by Farm Households in Tripura
source_organization: ICAR – Indian Journal of Extension Education
description: Empirical study of how farm households in West Tripura used and repaid agricultural loans, with recommendations for credit utilization improvement.

title: Impact of Agricultural Credit on Agricultural Productivity in India
source_organization: ICAR – Indian Journal of Agricultural Sciences
description: An empirical analysis examining the relationship between institutional credit and agricultural production levels in India.

title: Farmers' Financial Inclusion in Aspirational Districts of Karnataka
source_organization: ICAR – Indian Journal of Agricultural Sciences
description: Assessment of the extent and determinants of financial inclusion among farmers in Karnataka’s aspirational districts.

title: Status of Credit Facility for Horticultural Sector in India
source_organization: ICAR – Indian Journal of Agricultural Sciences
description: Empirical study on credit systems in horticulture, analyzing investment patterns and highlighting gaps in financial support.

title: Digitalization of Agriculture — The Future of Indian Agriculture
source_organization: ICAR – Journal of Agricultural Extension Management
description: Review of digital and e-agriculture initiatives in India and their potential to enhance access to finance, markets, and information.

title: Working with Resource-Poor Farmers to Manage Plant Diseases
description: Practical case studies of rice blast and potato late blight management using farmer field schools and participatory methods.

title: Soil Health Management
description: ALTERNATIVE: ‘Fundamentals of Soil Science’ and related ICAR e-course materials covering soil chemistry, fertility, and nutrient management.

title: Soil-health Management in Nutrient-Deficient Soils: A Case Study
source_organization: ICAR / Indian Journal of Agricultural Sciences
description: Case study PDF on soil-health management in nutrient-deficient soils.

title: Impact of Soil Health Card Scheme on Soil Fertility and Crop Productivity
source_organization: ICAR / Indian Journal of Extension Education
description: PDF analysing impact of Soil Health Card scheme on soil fertility and crop yields.

title: Capital Formation in Indian Agriculture (Occasional Paper)
description: An earlier version of NABARD’s Occasional Paper on capital formation, similar in scope to the 2024 paper.

title: Master Circular on Kisan Credit Card (KCC) Scheme (up to June 2017)
description: Consolidated circular on KCC scheme guidelines issued up to June 2017.

title: Operational Guidelines for PM-KISAN Scheme
source_organization: Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare, Government of India
description: Latest official operational guidelines for the PM-KISAN income support scheme.

title: Operational Guidelines for PM-KISAN Scheme
source_organization: Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare, Government of India
description: Official operational guidelines for the PM-KISAN scheme, accessible via government portals.
